dict.acceptation: 社区；社会团体；共同体；[生态] 群落；

sent.orig: Community Party branch 5, community party group 23, full-time is appoint meeting cadre 10.
sent.trans: 社区党支部5个，社区党小组23个，专职居委会干部10名。

sent.orig: Community building around the theme of community building to develop in depth.
sent.trans: 社区党建围绕社区建设主题向纵深发展。

sent.orig: Community participation is an important factor for sustainable tourism, and an effective way of community development.
sent.trans: 因此，社区参与是旅游可持续发展的重要因素，也是社区发展的有效途径。

sent.orig: The community management company. It offers very good community services.
sent.trans: 社区物业管理公司，他们提供非常好的社区服务。

sent.orig: It is the dominated species in Fir-Rhododendron Community and Alpine Rhododendron Community, common.
sent.trans: 该种是构成冷杉-杜鹃群落和高山杜鹃群落的优势种，常见。
